divs: sighting details was looking north out my door about midnight on april 12th. when a bright orange light from a slowly moving aircraft\object came into view. as the object moved closer overhead i could tell that it was triangular shaped. i believe it was some type of experimental aircraft as it was completely triangular shaped. the first craft proceeded due south. within 5 minutes a second craft appeared. it banked southeast. they were moving slower than a jet and flying at low altitude. there were clouds and they were flying under the clouds. their altitude was 1,000 to 2,000 feet. the craft looked about 40 - 80 feet long. about the size of a jet but was clearly triangular. havent seen any jets or aircraft like it before! i have worked at an airport and i know different aircraft when i see them. i photographed it but only got the running lights.
Summary: Was watching the northern sky when two triangle aircraft slowly zoomed overhead about 5 minutes apart heading south.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Louisville
There were no other sightings in Louisville on or around April 12th 2006
